channel.title: Problems C&Ping in Photoshop
channel.description: Okay, so, I'm not having any trouble at all when it comes to Prt Scrn but whenever I just try copying a picture and paste it into Photoshop it doesn't work, so I'm forced to keep Prt Scrning and lassoing and such. Is there something I'm missing that you have to do to copy and paste manually copied into Photoshop? All help appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Problems C&Ping in Photoshop
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Sorry, I don’t understand your question?

Just right click > copy image then open up Photoshop and hit Ctrl + V or edit > paste.

Read full topic
